column4: urgent, need help: i have installed fprot antivirus to scan my xp files, but it also found an infected file in xfprot folder called eicar.com... anybody have an idea of this (fprot can't disinfect or delete the file)...!!!
i can't delete it, neither fprot
should it be kept if it's harmless?
do you have write access enabled on the xp partition? thats prolly why you cant delete it.
lol dont do anything that will make sure you get infected and youll never be :) I havnt recieved any virus or worm in 2 years, use antivirus software to scan once a month just in case.
